mdRecord.dcterms:title: Amérique Septentrionale / publiée sous les auspices de Monseigneur le Duc d'Orleans prémier prince du sang, par le Sr. D'Anville, MDCCXLVI
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Anville, Jean Baptiste Bourguignon d', 1697-1782
Haye, G. de la.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Chez l'auteur, aux Galeries de Louvre
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lower right: Gravé par Guill'. Delahaye.
Inset: untitled, showing Hudson's Bay and Greenland.
Cartouche designed by Sr. Gravelot, engraved by Sr. Major.

Described by bookseller as the original issue of Anvill'es map, with a definite dotted boundary line from the "Montagnes d'Apalache" crossing the Cherokee River to the west border of South Carolina, and with very few branches of the Ohio River shown.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS. Copy 1-2: In both copies, some sheets have been pasted together to form 2 pieces. Tracy W. McGregor Library, American History Collection.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: North America--Maps--Early works to 1800
